id: scenario-value-scanner-retired-scenarios-household-household food security maintained on fixed budget
title: Household food security maintained on fixed budget
description: Household food security maintained on fixed budget
content:
Scenario: Household food security maintained on fixed budget
    Given household has $140/week grocery budget for two people
    And nutritional needs change with age for both partners
    When the household_elohim supports food planning
    Then it should help maintain nutrition within budget constraints
    And it should coordinate meal planning for both partners' dietary needs
    And it should reduce food waste to maximize budget efficiency
    And it should connect household to community food resources without stigma
    And food security should be maintained with dignity
    And household should not face nutrition inadequacy
